fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you shoot yourself on a night where you are converted into a non-town role, then you shoot a random townie instead and keep your original role
-May shoot any revealed mayors or mayor type roles without using a charge, and the attack is upgraded to unstoppable
-This is mechanically a Town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make the good faction lose (May win while dead)
